item.description:
OK: Here is my cell - do not call to ask if there are people - only call if you really need to. PRINT A COPY OF THE SCHEDULE AND IF YOU CAN'T GET INTO A BAR, JUST GO TO THE NEXT ONE 

603 557 4775

 

Ho ho ho! Merry X-mas, let's get drunk.

 

This pub crawl is a little different, we'll be at the Purple Shamrock for two hours and then each additional bar will be one hour. Why? Because I have learned the  first bar is where people are usually late and most likely to miss the group. Two hours is plenty of time for people to grab a bite to eat and we then we can move on.

 

Please send me suggestions if you want changes to the below list.

Please check this the day-of for changes.

I'll post my cell phone the day of, but please guys, don't call to ask if there are people on the crawl. There are always people on the crawl.

 

Purple Shamrock 4-6

Hennesy's 6-7

Ames Plow Taver 7-8

Coogans 8-9

 

All: I think Coogans has dancing on Saturday nights, so we can chill there or move on.  Again, please do not hesitate to let me know if you have alternate suggestions.  Feel free to join the crawl at any point.
item.name: Pub Crawl: Last Crawl of 2011
